3. Las Vegas Strip Helicopter Ride at Night


# Las Vegas Strip Helicopter Ride at Night

A nighttime helicopter ride to discover the city lights of Las Vegas

#3 Best seller in Las Vegas

4.5

·

Excellent

514 reviews

* * *

![an aerial view of a city at night](https://r-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/xphoto/max1200/311547849.webp?k=2d6984b96acc467290bad3d40071af04a924c78b0c43d72b7b4ee126cca90935&o=)![a view of a city at night](https://r-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/xphoto/max1200/433221599.webp?k=eee52e77b8578eef39d75c91501bfd6eb847f826b0cd1077de70d867e055bd2d&o=)![a red plane flying over a city at night](https://r-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/xphoto/max1200/433221611.webp?k=70d910d9ccc2afecfbae0e81b6df136bac2173e33c5c9b148101b326141410cc&o=)![a view of a city skyline at night](https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/xphoto/max1200/433221612.webp?k=6ef0128a08bd867d7ab4c1fe81dac4606d3d5ec1e3694b998468e5c3caa078d0&o=)![a view of a city at night with casinos](https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/xphoto/max1200/433221621.webp?k=2d130ca1a7f11f9f696a876129a163a99617227a715ce7b23ccc1bde164570c3&o=)

Show all photos

Free cancellation available

Up to 72 hours before the start time

On this nighttime helicopter ride, you will get to discover the breathtaking views of Las Vegas for 10–15 minutes. As you fly over the famous Las Vegas Strip, you will get to enjoy a bird's-eye view of the city’s top sights, including the New York-New York Hotel and Casino, the Eiffel Tower replica at Paris Las Vegas, Fountains of Bellagio and the laser beam of the Luxor.

## Why Visit

- Aerial views of iconic Vegas sites like the Eiffel Tower replica
- Nighttime helicopter ride over the Strip and Downtown Vegas
- Experience a hairpin turn around the 1000-foot-tall Stratosphere

## What's included

- 10–15-minute helicopter ride

## What's Not Included

What's not included

- Tips
- Hotel pickup and drop-off

### Restrictions

- Visitors need to show a valid photo ID.

- Arrive at least 60 minutes before the start time.


### Additional information

Please note that for comfort and the balance of the aircraft, This tour has a weight restriction. Passengers weighting more than 136 kg will be required to purchase an additional seat, paid to the tour provider directly on the day of the tour.

Please note that purses, backpacks and other baggage are not permitted on the aircraft due to limited spaces.

Infants aged 0–1 years can travel for free if they don’t occupy their own seat.

Infants aged 0–1 years must bring their passport or a copy of their birth certificate as proof of age in case they purchase a discounted ticket.

Please note that cameras and phones are welcomed, but the use of selfie sticks and extending camera poles inside and around the aircraft is strictly prohibited.

### Frequently asked questions

#### How do I book a ticket?

- Select a date and time.

- Choose the number of tickets.

- Click to the next page and enter your personal details.

- After entering your personal details, select your payment method and enter your payment details.

- Once you’ve entered your payment details, you’ll be redirected to the ticket page where you can check the status and details of your reservations.

- You'll receive a confirmation email once the reservation is confirmed with the attraction operator. This could take some time depending on the supplier.

- You can view your tickets in the confirmation email or in the Bookings & Trips section of your account.


* * *

#### When do I pay?

Booking.com collects payment on behalf of the attraction operator when you book your ticket.

* * *

#### How do digital tickets work?

Each digital ticket contains a unique code. This is usually a QR or numerical code, but could be something else and can be found on your ticket or the PDF sent to you.

If your digital ticket contains a barcode or QR code, show it to the staff at the attraction's entrance or ticket collection point for them to scan.

For those with numerical codes, show your ticket to staff for verification.

* * *

#### Can I cancel or modify my tickets?

You’ll need to check the policy on the specific ticket you book. Last-minute bookings might not have free cancellation available.

* * *

#### When will I get my free cancellation refund?

After you cancel, we'll issue a full refund immediately. Depending on your bank or payment provider, it can take 3–10 days to be refunded to your original payment method.

metadata.description: Find out about Las Vegas Strip Helicopter Ride at Night like tour times and location. Book tickets online with free cancellation and skip-the-line access!

json.Attraction_name: Las Vegas Strip Helicopter Ride at Night
Why visit: Aerial views of iconic Vegas sites like the Eiffel Tower replica
Nighttime helicopter ride over the Strip and Downtown Vegas
Experience a hairpin turn around the 1000-foot-tall Stratosphere
Restrictions: Visitors need to show a valid photo ID.
Arrive at least 60 minutes before the start time.
Location: 5060 Koval Lane, Las Vegas, NV, NV 89119
additional Information: Passengers weighing more than 136 kg will be required to purchase an additional seat, paid to the tour provider directly on the day of the tour.
Purses, backpacks, and other baggage are not permitted on the aircraft due to limited spaces.
Infants aged 0–1 years can travel for free if they don’t occupy their own seat.
Infants must bring their passport or a copy of their birth certificate as proof of age in case they purchase a discounted ticket.
Cameras and phones are welcomed, but the use of selfie sticks and extending camera poles inside and around the aircraft is strictly prohibited.
